Aluminium Joinery Repairs

We repair aluminium joinery across Wellington: window handles, door handles, window locks (including Yale), stays, hinges, rollers, wedges/seals and leak fixes for single and double-glazed windows and doors.

Common joinery repairs

  • Window handle and door handle replacement
  • Window lock and latch alignment (including Yale window locks)
  • Sliding door rollers and track refurbishment
  • Awning stays, hinges and restrictors
  • Glazing wedges/seals and draught/leak fixes
  • Mitre & sill reseals for leaking joinery

Where we work

Wellington, Porirua, Lower Hutt, Upper Hutt, Petone and Kāpiti.

Related services: Window repairs • Sliding door repairs • Hardware & wedges

Joinery repair FAQs

  • What does aluminium joinery repair include?
    Handles, locks, stays, hinges, rollers, wedges/seals, alignment and leak fixes on aluminium windows and doors.
  • Do you work on single and double glazed joinery?
    Yes. We service both single- and double-glazed aluminium joinery across Wellington and the Hutt Valley.
  • Do you service Wellington and Porirua?
    Yes. We cover Wellington, Porirua, Lower Hutt, Upper Hutt, Petone and Kāpiti.

Get a quote for aluminium joinery repairs

Call 021 638 205

FAQs

Do you replace old joinery hardware?

Yes. We source compatible handles, locks, rollers and wedges for older aluminium joinery.

Can you fix a leaking aluminium window?

Yes. We diagnose the leak path and reseal or replace wedges/seals as needed.
